issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: Starting early this AM, website hosted on node.ACS  3ee59e6b707adb9a55682953469e868c425395f6 has been taking minutes to load a few simple images on ACS.  Must be some sort of server issue?  Is there a place to report this or monitor for issues like this in Node.ACS?
fields.summary: Node.ACS Taking Minutes to serve images

comments.body: Thanks for reporting this issue. We will take a look at this issue proactively today.

I am able to reproduce this issue intermittently with the following link "http://3ee59e6b707adb9a55682953469e868c425395f6.cloudapp.appcelerator.com" so I am moving this to engineering for further troubleshooting.
We have resolved the issue on the server side so please give it a try and let us know if the issue persists.
